name: Slew rate limiter
description: This algorithm is a simple slew rate limiter, offering both logarithmic and linear slew to smooth CVs and create glissandos. You can choose to use a single slew rate for both rising and falling signals, or specify them separately. You can also choose to use the same rates for all the busses, or specify them individually.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process, ranging from 1 to 8.

input_ports.name: Input bus
input_ports.description: The input bus, numbered from 1 to 28. The algorithm processes this bus for slew rate limiting.

output_ports.name: Output bus
output_ports.description: The output bus, numbered from 0 to 28. If set to 'None', the input bus is used as output and the mode is always 'Replace'.
